MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 04-DEC-2020 08:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the KY14 postcode area of Cupar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:01am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:28am on 4th December
